T.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01'  and c.imageid > 1000)

F.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-10' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01'  and c.imageid > 1000)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01'  and c.imageid > 1000)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01'  and c.imageid > 1000 and c.style is null)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and questionposition >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01'  and c.imageid > 1000)

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01' )

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where ( q.externalsystemid >70 and q.etl_time < '2016-12-16' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 ) or (q.required='t' and q.imageid<1000 and c.etl_time  > '2017-02-01' )
